---
name: Bug Report / 反馈 Bug
about: Something isn't working as expected
title: "[Bug] "
labels: bug
---

**Environment / 环境**
- Windows version: (e.g. Windows 11 23H2)
- Screenshot tool: (e.g. Win+Shift+S, Snipaste, PrintScreen)
- Terminal: (e.g. Windows Terminal, cmd, PowerShell)

**What happened / 发生了什么**
A clear description of the bug.

**Steps to reproduce / 复现步骤**
1. ...
2. ...

**Expected behavior / 期望行为**
What should have happened.

**Log output (if available) / 日志**
Run this command and paste the output:
```powershell
Get-Content "$env:TEMP\clipboard-img2file\monitor.log" | Select-Object -Last 20
```
